DataPackage.json Creator [source code for this app]

This app is built in pure Javascript and HTML and is intentionally very simple (and unstyled).

It is intended as a demonstrator and for direct code copying by those who want to integrate Data Package creation into their own apps and workflows. Source code can be found here.

It can be used directly for creating datapackage.json. However, that is not its primary purpose and if you are looking for an online DataPackage.json creator we recommend visiting the creator app on data.okfn.org.
